name: seeds-of-hope
description: Seeds of Hope - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "blue,green" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:production: cd frontend && NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=/backend npm run build && cd ../backend && npm install --production
